{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"To begin this problem, let us attempt to find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left\lfloor \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" n "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" such that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 0 \leq n \leq 2016 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Looking at the value "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we see that this will be extremely close to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}} = n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" because of the exponents which will lead to extremely large numbers for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" n \geq 2 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Seeing the additional "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that is added in the denominator of the fraction, we can deduce that the fraction "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" will have a value slightly lower than "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n \geq 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Therefore the greatest integer less than "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left\lfloor \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", will be equivalent to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" n-1 "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n\geq 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So, we now know the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left\lfloor \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for the integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" n=2,3,4 \ldots 2014,2015,2016"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Therefore, to find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sum_{n=0}^{2016} \left\lfloor \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we must simply add the values of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left\lfloor \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n=0,1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sum_{n=2}^{2016} \left\lfloor \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" \sum_{n=0}^{2016} \left\lfloor \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor = \left\lfloor \frac{0^{2016}}{0^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor + \left\lfloor \frac{1^{2016}}{1^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor + \sum_{n=2}^{2016} \left\lfloor \frac{n^{2016}}{n^{2015}+1} \right\rfloor =  \left\lfloor \frac{0}{1} \right\rfloor+ \left\lfloor \frac{1}{2} \right\rfloor + \sum_{n=2}^{2016} n-1 =  0 + 0 + 1 + 2 + 3 +\ldots + 2013 +2014 + 2015 = "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":" 1 + 2 + 3 +\ldots + 2013 +2014 + 2015 = \frac{(2015+1)\cdot2015}{2} = \frac{2016\cdot2015}{2} = 1008\cdot2015=\boxed{2031120}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
